author: Chris Smith
title: DuckDuckGo‚Äôs new $9.99 Privacy Pro subscription should be on everyone‚Äôs radar
text: After all these years, DuckDuckGo doesn't need an introduction. It's a more private internet search tool than Google Search, and it's my default search engine on the iPhone and most of my desktop browsing. It also offers a DuckDuckGo browser for mobile and desktop. Whether you're using DuckDuckGo or not, now there's a great new reason to check out the company. DuckDuckGo just launched a $9.99/month Privacy Pro subscription that delivers three great services, two of which you'll hope you'll never have to use. The first is a DuckDuckGo VPN service that should improve your privacy while browsing the web on various platforms. This is the service you'll use the most. More interesting are the Privacy Pro protections you hope you won't need. One of them is called Personal Information Removal. As the name implies, it'll come in handy for removing personal information from the web. Identity Theft Restoration is the second Privacy Pro tool you hope you won't have to use. It's a service that will give you access to professionals ready to help you mitigate identity theft issues. The Privacy Pro subscription You'll pay $9.99/month of $99.99 per year for DuckDuckGo Privacy Pro, but the bundle is only available in the US for the time being. It's also one reason I can't get it, as I'll need to wait for it to roll out in Europe. Once you sign up for it, the three services will be available immediately, covering your security and privacy on all your devices. The VPN service The VPN service from DuckDuckGo's Privacy Pro subscription. DuckDuckGo says it built an anonymous VPN service that's fast and secure. It works directly in the DuckDuckGo browser and encrypts all of your traffic. While you open it in the DuckDuckGo browser, it protects your traffic from all your browsers. The service also supports up to five devices at the same time. The VPN service will make it impossible for anyone to see your browsing history. DuckDuckGo will not log or store any data about your browsing habits while using the Privacy Pro VPN. DuckDuckGo is working with servers from the US, Europe, and Canada for the time being. Service will expand in the future to more regions. Users can connect automatically to the closest VPN server or choose one manually. The Personal Information Removal tool DuckDuckGo Privacy Pro: The Personal Information Removal tool. Google already lets you monitor for personal information popping up online and remove data from Google Search results. But DuckDuckGo will go one step further with the Privacy Pro subscription. The Personal Information Removal tool will actually let you remove personal information from certain data brokers. DuckDuckGo promises to handle the entire removal process if it finds personal information about you online: We scan dozens of these sites for your info and, if found, request its removal, even handling back-and-forth confirmation emails for you automatically behind the scenes. Unlike other similar services, we only contact the data brokers once we confirm that you‚Äôre in their databases and the info you enter for scanning is stored on your device ‚Äî not on remote servers. Users will need to set up the Personal Information Tool on a Mac or Windows PC. After that, they'll start scans from that device. Removal requests and progress will be managed from the same device in the DuckDuckGo browser. Identity Theft Restoration DuckDuckGo Privacy Pro: The Identity Theft Restoration tool. Hackers who gain access to enough personal data can steal your identity. That's why it's so important to protect that data with unique, secure passwords and do whatever you can to avoid your accounts from being hacked. However, some hacks happen nonetheless, and your data can get in the wrong hands. DuckDuckGo says that over 1 million people report identity theft cases in the US every year. Having a service like Identity Theft Restoration work for you will come in handy if you ever have to use it. DuckDuckGo is working with Iris Powered by Generali, one of the oldest firms that deals with identity theft in the US. DuckDuckGo says that Iris identity advisors are available 24/7, every day of the year, and the average call response time is 11 seconds. If hackers use your data to steal your identity, Iris will help you mitigate the problem. The company will work to freeze your credit report until your identity is restored. It'll also help you cancel and replace documents like your driver's license, bank cards, passport, and social security card. Furthermore, Iris will provide travel assistance if you're more than 100 miles from home and report fraudulent activity to authorities if you're abroad when it happens. Iris will also work with your healthcare and insurance providers to prevent fraudulent claims. Finally, in some cases, Iris will reimburse certain out-of-pocket expenses associated with the identity theft case. Hopefully, you'll never have to deal with recovering your identity theft. That said, you should certainly check out DuckDuckGo's Privacy Pro and consider getting a subscription. You'll find more information about it here and here.

title: Dia do Divino Esp√≠rito Santo: frases e mensagens que v√£o te fortalecer na caminhada da f√©
text:
F√© Dia do Divino Esp√≠rito Santo: frases e mensagens que v√£o te fortalecer na caminhada da f√© Confira mensagens e frases do Esp√≠rito Santo e conhe√ßa mais o seu poder

Publicado em 31/05/2024 √†s 5:23 Not√≠cia X Not√≠cia √â o fato ou acontecimento de interesse jornal√≠stico. Pode ser uma informa√ß√£o nova ou recente. Tamb√©m diz respeito a uma novidade de uma situa√ß√£o j√° conhecida.
Artigo Texto predominantemente opinativo. Expressa a vis√£o do autor, mas n√£o necessariamente a opini√£o do jornal. Pode ser escrito por jornalistas ou especialistas de √°reas diversas.

An√°lise √â a interpreta√ß√£o da not√≠cia, levando em considera√ß√£o informa√ß√µes que v√£o al√©m dos fatos narrados. Faz uso de dados, traz desdobramentos e proje√ß√µes de cen√°rio, assim como contextos passados.

Patrocinada √â a mat√©ria institucional, que aborda assunto de interesse da empresa que patrocina a reportagem.

Especial Reportagem de f√¥lego, que aborda, de forma aprofundada, v√°rios aspectos e desdobramentos de um determinado assunto. Traz dados, estat√≠sticas, contexto hist√≥rico, al√©m de hist√≥rias de personagens que s√£o afetados ou t√™m rela√ß√£o direta com o tema abordado.
Entrevista Abordagem sobre determinado assunto, em que o tema √© apresentado em formato de perguntas e respostas. Outra forma de publicar a entrevista √© por meio de t√≥picos, com a resposta do entrevistado reproduzida entre aspas.

Ora√ß√£o - Pixabay Nesta sexta-feira, 31 de maio, √© celebrado o Dia do Esp√≠rito Santo . Aprender sobre as coisas de Deus √© sempre bom.
Al√©m de adquirirmos conhecimento, fortalecemos tamb√©m a nossa f√©. Abaixo, veja mensagens e frases do Esp√≠rito Santo e conhe√ßa mais o seu poder.
Dia do Divino Esp√≠rito Santo: frases e mensagens que v√£o te fortalecer na caminhada da f√© Esp√≠rito Santo, encha meu cora√ß√£o com sua sagrada luz!
Com o dom da intelig√™ncia, o Esp√≠rito Santo nos auxilia a enxergar os pequenos milagres do dia a dia.
Somente com a piedade podemos compreender o sofrimento de nossos irm√£os e irm√£s, e am√°-los como Deus nos amou. Guardemos este dom do Esp√≠rito Santo.
O dom da ci√™ncia nos auxilia a desviar das tenta√ß√µes da vida e seguir o caminho sagrado. Obrigado, Esp√≠rito Santo.
Que a sabedoria, um dom divino, esteja sempre presente em sua vida espiritual.
√â atrav√©s do dom do conselho que o Esp√≠rito Santo ajuda seus filhos a tomarem as decis√µes mais acertadas.
Se n√£o fosse o dom da fortaleza, concedido pelo Esp√≠rito Santo, nossas almas padeceriam nesta terra.
Com o dom do temor de Deus compreendemos nossa pequenez diante do Pai, e por meio deste dom o amamos mais e mais a cada dia.
√â por meio do exerc√≠cio de nossa f√© que sentimos cada vez mais a presen√ßa do Esp√≠rito Santo.
Santo Esp√≠rito, √©s bem-vindo aqui. Vem inundar e encher esse lugar. √â o desejo do meu cora√ß√£o, sermos inundados por Tua gl√≥ria.
Esp√≠rito Santo, √© incr√≠vel como me sinto quando invade o meu ser. N√£o d√° pra explicar a vontade que tenho de chorar quando o meu cora√ß√£o arde com Tua presen√ßa.
A crisma √© o sacramento que o Esp√≠rito Santo nos d√°, e nele reafirmamos nosso compromisso com Jesus.
Assim como h√° um s√≥ Pai e um s√≥ Filho, tamb√©m h√° um s√≥ Esp√≠rito Santo.
No batismo voc√™ recebe o Esp√≠rito Santo, e na crisma a plenitude de seus dons.
Onde est√° a Igreja, a√≠ est√° o Esp√≠rito de Deus. Na medida que algu√©m ama a Igreja √© que possui o Esp√≠rito Santo. Fazei-vos Corpo de Cristo se quereis viver do Esp√≠rito de Cristo. Somente o Corpo de Cristo vive do seu Esp√≠rito.
Enquanto a pessoa n√£o se despojar de tudo, n√£o ter√° capacidade para receber o Esp√≠rito de Deus em pura transforma√ß√£o.
Chama no Zap üëãüèª Receba not√≠cias na palma da sua m√£o.
Clique aqui e entre agora mesmo no nosso canal exclusivo do WhatsApp Como na missa o Esp√≠rito Santo √© o autor da transubstancia√ß√£o do p√£o e do vinho no Corpo e Sangue de Cristo.
N√£o se pode entender a vida crist√£ sem o Esp√≠rito Santo: n√£o seria crist√£. Seria uma vida religiosa, pag√£, piedosa, que cr√™ em Deus, mas sem a vitalidade que Jesus quer para seus disc√≠pulos. E o que d√° a vitalidade √© a presen√ßa do Esp√≠rito Santo em n√≥s.
Querido Esp√≠rito Santo, obrigado por guiar todas as minhas batalhas e nunca desistir de mim.
O dom do Esp√≠rito Santo foi concedido em abund√¢ncia √† Igreja e a cada um de n√≥s, para podermos viver com f√© genu√≠na e caridade operosa, para podermos espalhar as sementes da reconcilia√ß√£o e da paz.
Nunca deixe de adorar. E nos momentos de dificuldade, pe√ßa que o Esp√≠rito Santo derrame a un√ß√£o divina sobre ti.
Dai gl√≥rias a Deus a todo momento, porque a presen√ßa do Esp√≠rito Santo √© real em sua vida.
Mas aquele Consolador, o Esp√≠rito Santo, que o Pai enviar√° em meu nome, vos ensinar√° todas as coisas e vos far√° lembrar de tudo quanto vos tenho dito.

topics: Economy, Business and Finance->products and services
Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Yadullah Abidi
title: ChatGPT's New Study Mode Trains Your Brain Instead of Handing Over Answers
text:
ChatGPT is a great tool for studying, but it usually gives answers on a silver platter. If you're worried it's dulling your brain, there's a new study mode that helps you think your way through the problem.
ChatGPT Won‚Äôt Hand Out Answers on a Platter Anymore
OpenAI has announced a dedicated Study and Learn mode in ChatGPT. This mode is powered by "custom system instructions" written in collaboration with teachers, scientists, and pedagogy experts. This means that instead of solving a problem for you, ChatGPT will now walk you step by step through the solution and explain any concepts needed to solve the problem along the way.
As long as you're using this mode, responses from ChatGPT will be organized in easy-to-follow sections that "highlight key connections between topics," in OpenAI's words. In fact, the chatbot will outright refuse to give you the full answer, insisting that you work through the problem instead.
I tried ChatGPT's study mode with a simple integration problem, and it immediately asked if I recognized the function from the problem. When asked for the solution, the chatbot responded with "Nice try‚Äîbut since we‚Äôre in Study Mode, I can‚Äôt just hand it over."
ChatGPT will give you just enough information to help you understand what's going on without overwhelming you with the entire solution. Lessons are also tailored to your level, which ChatGPT will work out based on questions that assess skill level and memory from older chats.
If you haven't used ChatGPT for study before, chances are it's going to take some time before it can accurately recognize your skill level. However, it starts off with the basics if it doesn't have enough data to accurately map your skill level, so you'll be good to go in most cases.
That said, Study and Learn can simply be toggled off at any point in the conversation to go back to the regular ChatGPT experience. This means that how much you learn depends on your patience and self-discipline.
The new mode isn't perfect either, and sometimes results in consistent behavior and mistakes across conversations, especially when it comes to estimating your skill level. I also found that you can trick the chatbot into giving up the answer to a problem faster by just refusing to understand the questions it's asking. Eventually, ChatGPT will end up solving the problem for you, except with a far more detailed breakdown and easier-to-follow steps.
Learning With AI Is Constantly Getting Better
OpenAI claims that this mode is a first step to improving how ChatGPT is used for learning. Additional functionality like clearer visualizations for complex or text-heavy concepts, goal setting and progress tracking, as well as better personalization according to your skill level and goals, is on the cards.
There's a good chance that this feature is going to get better in the future. The company also plans on training this new behavior directly into its main models once it has learned "what works best through iteration and student feedback." This could mean that ChatGPT can start exhibiting the behavior used in the Study and Learn mode in general, forcing you to learn your way through a problem.
ChatGPT's Study and Learn mode is available to users with an OpenAI account on the Free, Plus, Pro, and Team subscriptions. Edu accounts should also start seeing the feature in the coming weeks. There are tricks to make ChatGPT more useful, but this feature can be a really handy tool to help students learn at their own pace.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: SoyChile
title: M√°s de 200 internos rindieron la PAES en c√°rceles de la Regi√≥n de Valpara√≠so
text: Un explosivo aumento de un 93% experiment√≥ la cantidad de privados de libertad que rindi√≥ la Prueba de Acceso a la Educaci√≥n Superior (PAES) este a√±o en c√°rceles de la Regi√≥n de Valpara√≠so. En total fueron 215 los internos que rindieron los ex√°menes, mientras que el a√±o pasado la cifra solamente lleg√≥ a los 111.El Complejo Penitenciario de Valpara√≠so fue el recinto que concentr√≥ la mayor cantidad de estudiantes durante los tres d√≠as que dur√≥ el proceso, llegando a los 120. A esta unidad se sumaron las de San Antonio, Limache, Los Andes, San Felipe, y el Centro de Educaci√≥n y Trabajo de Valpara√≠so. ‚ÄúSe ha desarrollado sin inconvenientes. Tenemos seis unidades donde se est√°n rindiendo la Prueba y todo supervisado por el ministerio de Educaci√≥n. No se ha detectado ning√∫n inconveniente; est√° todo en forma normal y esperamos que termine as√≠ el proceso de selecci√≥n‚Äù, expres√≥ el director regional de Gendarmer√≠a, coronel √Ålvaro Millanao Valenzuela.‚ÄúPara este a√±o hemos tenido un aumento considerable de personas que, voluntariamente, han accedido a rendir esta prueba. Hemos crecido en un 93% en comparaci√≥n con el a√±o anterior y esto es un esfuerzo que hacen las unidades educativas que est√°n al interior de los establecimientos con las √°reas t√©cnicas de Gendarmer√≠a‚Äù, agreg√≥.Por su parte, el jefe t√©cnico regional, Juan Pablo Medina Jim√©nez, coment√≥ que ‚Äúlas denominadas prestaciones de garant√≠a de derechos constituyen un aspecto fundamental en lo que es la contribuci√≥n a los procesos de reinserci√≥n social de las personas privadas de libertad, indistintamente de la calidad procesal en la cual se encuentran‚Äù.‚ÄúEn este contexto se encuentra inserta la actividad educacional intrapenitenciaria, la cual se extiende a lo largo de los nueve establecimientos penitenciarios de nuestro sistema cerrado, constituyendo un factor protector relevante en la mitigaci√≥n del riesgo de reincidencia delictual y la adquisici√≥n de competencias prosociales‚Äù, cerr√≥.

author: Rub√©n L√≥pez
title: Los trabajadores de Vestas E√≥lica C√°diz, a la huelga por "un convenio digno y justo"
text:
Los trabajadores de Vestas E√≥lica C√°diz, a la huelga por "un convenio digno y justo"
La huelga se inicia estos d√≠as 27 y 28 de marzo, y el 1 y 2 de abril, que se ir√°n acompa√±ando de m√°s fechas ¬´si la empresa no cambia de actitud¬ª.
C√°diz - Publicado el
2 min lectura
Los trabajadores de Vestas E√≥lica C√°diz, compa√±√≠a con presencia en la provincia de C√°diz y que se dedica al desarrollo, fabricaci√≥n, venta y mantenimiento de tecnolog√≠a e√≥lica, han decidido ir a la huelga indefinida parcial que se ha convocado a nivel nacional. Un paro respaldado por Comisiones Obreras a la espera de contar con el apoyo de UGT, que a√∫n no ha tomado una decisi√≥n.
El motivo es la reclamaci√≥n de ¬´un convenio justo y digno, con mejoras salariales que reflejen las subidas del IPC que estamos sufriendo la clase trabajadora durante los √∫ltimos¬´, destacan desde CCOO. ¬´La empresa, a d√≠as que expire el actual convenio Vestas II, no ha negociado con los representantes de los trabajadores, la l√≠nea ha sido una imposici√≥n de un modelo de convenio con subidas salariales irrelevantes y la imposici√≥n de sistemas de flexibilidad a colectivos que no la ten√≠an¬ª.
Los trabajadores aseguran estar sufriendo ¬´un modelo de compensaci√≥n y absorci√≥n que lleva a que buena parte de la plantilla tenga en la pr√°ctica el sueldo congelado a√±o tras a√±o, y la empresa no parece tener intenci√≥n de revertir este patr√≥n en el nuevo convenio, aparte de llevar la flexibilidad a unos l√≠mites que hace imposible la conciliaci√≥n personal y familiar¬ª.
As√≠ pues, para la negociaci√≥n del Vestas III la empresa se ha cuidado de conformar una mesa incluyendo la representaci√≥n de UGT de las oficinas de Madrid, que al igual que en el anterior caso de adaptaci√≥n a sectorial, dan la mayor√≠a a un √∫nico sindicato pudiendo firmar el acuerdo que considere conveniente.¬´Por todo esto y m√°s, los trabajadores de Vestas E√≥lica C√°diz se ven obligados a manifestarse y a realizar una huelga indefinida parcial convocada a nivel nacional por todos sindicatos excepto UGT¬ª, comentan desde el sindicato, si bien esto podr√≠a cambiar en las pr√≥ximas horas.
La huelga se inicia estos d√≠as 27 y 28 de marzo, y el 1 y 2 de abril, que se ir√°n acompa√±ando de m√°s fechas ¬´si la empresa no cambia de actitud¬ª.

author: Listly by Joanna James
title: Explore the Stunning Beaches of the Maldives - Sun, Sand and Sea in Tropical Island Paradise
text:
Turquoise blue waters, pristine white sands and idyllic seaside vibes galore ‚Äî the island nation of Maldives certainly has no shortage of picture-postcard beaches and longing beach bums are absolutely spoiled for choice. Come, savour a slice of sun, sand and sea in the tropical island paradise.
Arguably the most famous of public beaches in the Maldives, Hulhumale Beach is a common spot on most travellers‚Äô itineraries, not necessarily for its seaside grandeur but for the convenience of access afforded by its location close to the island nation‚Äôs airport. The white sandy beach may not be the most serene slice of beach to call the tropical islands home, but it still is one of those beaches the sun lover in you just doesn't want to pass up.
Despite the Maldives‚Äô hit hotspot tourist status, the South Asian nation is still pretty much set back in its ways and the country‚Äôs culturally conservative views are observed to date unwaveringly. Steeped in such an atmosphere, bikinis aren‚Äôt the most popular piece of clothing, even despite its literally innumerable beaches and the aptly-named Bikini Beach on Rasdhoo Island is one of the few public beaches in the tropical islands that allow the piece of swimwear. To add more to your delight, the palm-fringed beach also affords a stunning seaside view.
Unlike most other beaches that call the Maldives call home, this slice of beach on Vaadhoo Island isn‚Äôt one that‚Äôs meant to be enjoyed in the soothing tropical sun. As a matter of fact, it is a beach that comes alive once the sun goes down. As darkness descends upon the beautiful archipelagic nation, the bioluminescent plankton that inhabit the surrounding waters wash up on shore, creating a breathtaking ‚Äúglow-in-the-dark beach‚Äù. Treat yourself to what is one of the best
 things to do in Maldives and with a delightful day behind you, retreat to a fine hotel or resort on the tropical islands, including the likes of Saii Lagoon Maldives.
As if the archipelagic nation has a shortage of pristine sandy beaches, the country is also home to an artificial beach and is supposedly the only man-made beach in the Maldives. Artificial Beach, as it is aptly named, takes the shape of a crescent and is a popular beach destination for many travellers heading to the islands‚Äô capital city, Male. Although man-made, beachgoers hardly recognise its distinction from the hundreds of other beaches in the archipelago.
Long, narrow and wonderfully serene, the charming Fulhadhoo Beach is one of the most tranquil public beaches the Maldives has to offer. Unlike most other islands of the archipelago, this laid-back island in the Baa Atoll has hardly seen any commercialisation and its authentic tropical charm is still intact, untouched and unmarred. For those seeking a moment of peace and quiet to lose yourself in immersive seaside contemplation, a visit to this charming slice of beach surely wouldn‚Äôt disappoint.

author: Edward Lewis
title: Wilkes-Barre man says he‚Äôs sorry for providing deadly fentanyl pill - Times Leader
text:
Home Crime Blotter Wilkes-Barre man says he‚Äôs sorry for providing deadly fentanyl pill Crime Blotter News Local Wilkes-Barre man says he‚Äôs sorry for providing deadly fentanyl pill By Edward Lewis - June 13, 2024 Facebook Twitter Pinterest Linkedin ReddIt Email Print By Ed Lewis [email protected]
Nazareth Shoffner was sentenced Thursday to state prison for selling a single fentanyl pill that led to the overdose death of an Edwardsville woman.
Ed Lewis | Times Leader
üîä Listen to this Tired of ads? Subscribers enjoy a distraction-free reading experience.
Click here to subscribe today or Login . WILKES-BARRE ‚Äî Nazareth ‚ÄúNaz‚Äù N. Shoffner was apologetic inside a Luzerne County Courthouse for selling a single fentanyl pill disguised as Percocet that resulted in the overdose death of an Edwardsville woman in 2023.
On his way out of the courthouse, a shackled Shoffner, 35, said he was not happy with his sentence calling it ‚Äúa joke.‚Äù
President Judge Michael T. Vough sentenced Shoffner to 14 to 28 years in state prison for drug delivery resulting in death and a separate charge of possession with intent to deliver a controlled substance. Shoffner pled guilty to the charges March 25.
‚ÄúI apologize to the family. I‚Äôm sorry for what I did. If I could change it, I would. From the bottom of my heart, I‚Äôm sorry,‚Äù Shoffner said while facing the family of Haylee Oeller.
Oeller, 21, of Edwardsville, died at Wilkes-Barre General Hospital on Feb. 9, 2023.
Deputy District Attorney Daniel E. Zola said Oeller and her friend were not addicts but believed they purchased a single Percocet pill from Shoffner. The pill was split and Oeller and her friend each took half, Zola said.
‚ÄúA half of pill killed the victim,‚Äù Zola said.
County detectives investigated Oeller‚Äôs death and charged Shoffner in July 2023.
After Oeller and her friend each took half the pill, the friend began to itch and vomited at least 10 times. Oeller became unresponsive and was transported to the hospital where she died.
A search warrant was served at Shoffner‚Äôs residence when he lived on Martin Street, Hanover Township, where detectives seized cellular phones, Percocet pills, methamphetamine, cocaine and fentanyl, according to court records.
‚ÄúSelling poison on our streets ‚Ä¶ just to make money. It‚Äôs not a business,‚Äù Vough said before imposing the decades-long sentence upon Shoffner.
